directions: Melt butter in 3-quart saucepan. Add onion and garlic; cook till onion is soft. Add chicken strips and cook 2-3 minutes or till no longer pink. Add broth, water, spinach, and pasta. Cover, increase heat to high and bring to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer covered 5-7 minutes till chicken and pasta are cooked.
Meanwhile, whisk together eggs and both peppers.
Bring soup back to a boil, and add egg mixture in a slow steady stream, using a back and forth motion.  Remove from heat as soon as egg has set. Pour into 4 bowls, sprinkle each serving with cheese.
ingredients: 12 ounces skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - cut into strips
title: Stracciatella
